name: G-RINSE™
title: G-RINSE™
subtitle: Rinse Solution
description: This solution is designed for rinsing all contacted materials and for washing the cervix before oocyte aspiration and embryo transfer.

specifications.Purpose: Solution for rinsing all contacted materials and washing the cervix. Not for culture use.
specifications.Application: Ready for use after equilibration at +37°C.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-IVF™ PLUS
title: G-IVF™ PLUS
subtitle: Fertilization Medium
description: This medium is designed for the preparation of male and female gametes and in vitro fertilization. It contains carbohydrates and amino acids to support the function of male and female gametes.

specifications.Purpose: Medium for the preparation of male and female gametes and in vitro fertilization.
specifications.Application: Can be used after equilibration at +37°C and %6 CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-1™ PLUS
title: G-1™ v5 PLUS
subtitle: Cleavage Medium
description: This medium is developed to support embryos during the cleavage stage up to approximately the 8-cell stage. It contains carbohydrates, amino acids, and connectors to support early embryo development.

specifications.Purpose: Medium for culturing embryos from the pronuclear stage to day 2 or 3.
specifications.Definition: Bicarbonate-buffered medium containing hyaluronan and human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Can be used after equilibration at +37°C and %6 CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: EmbryoGlue®
title: EmbryoGlue®
subtitle: Specially designed medium to increase implantation rates for improving live birth outcomes.

specifications.Definition: Bicarbonate-buffered medium containing hyaluronan and recombinant human albumin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after equilibration at +37°C and %6 CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-MOPS™
title: G-MOPS™
subtitle: Handling Medium
description: This medium is designed to support oocytes and embryos during handling under ambient atmospheric conditions. It contains carbohydrates and amino acids to support gametes and embryos, and a buffer to maintain correct pH under ambient air.

specifications.Purpose: Medium for transporting and handling oocytes and embryos under ambient conditions.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after equilibration at +37°C under ambient conditions.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-GAMETE™
title: G-GAMETE™
subtitle: Gamete Preparation Medium
description: G-GAMETE™ is an incubatable medium designed to maintain pH stability in a CO₂-free environment.

specifications.Intended Use: For covering the medium in in vitro fertilization and micromanipulation procedures.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C and 6% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: HSA-solution™
title: HSA-solution™
subtitle: Human Serum Albumin Solution
description: HSA is an additive for all embryo culture media. It contains 100 mg/mL of Human Serum Albumin.

specifications.Intended Use: Human Serum Albumin (100 mg/mL) solution prepared for addition to gamete and embryo media.
specifications.Application: To be added to gamete and embryo media.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-MOPS™ PLUS
title: G-MOPS™ PLUS
subtitle: Transport Medium
description: G-MOPS™ PLUS is designed to support the transport and handling of oocytes and embryos during processing.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium for transporting oocytes and embryos under atmospheric conditions.
specifications.Application: For use after pre-equilibration at +37°C under 6% CO₂ for oocyte aspiration and gamete/embryo handling.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-TL™
title: G-TL™
subtitle: One-Step Culture Medium
description: G-TL™ is a continuous culture medium specifically designed for time-lapse imaging systems.

specifications.Intended Use: For embryo culture from fertilization to blastocyst stage.
specifications.Description: Bicarbonate buffered medium containing hyaluronan and human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C and 6% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-2™ PLUS
title: G-2™ v5 PLUS
subtitle: Blastocyst Development Medium
description: This medium is designed to support embryo development from the 8-cell stage to the blastocyst stage. It contains carbohydrates, amino acids, and integrators to support advanced embryo development.

specifications.Intended Use: For culturing embryos from day 3 to the blastocyst stage.
specifications.Application: Can be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C and 6% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-IVF™
title: G-IVF™
subtitle: Fertilization Medium
description: This medium is designed for the preparation of male and female gametes and in vitro fertilization. It contains carbohydrates and amino acids to support the function of both male and female gametes.

specifications.Intended Use: For the preparation of male and female gametes and in vitro fertilization.
specifications.Application: Can be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C and 6% CO₂, following the addition of G-MM™ or HSA-solution™.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-1™
title: G-1™ v5
subtitle: Cleavage Medium
description: This medium is designed to support embryos during the cleavage stage, up to the 8-cell stage. It contains carbohydrates, amino acids, and integrators to support early embryo development.

specifications.Intended Use: For culturing embryos from pronuclear stage to day 2 or 3.
specifications.Application: Can be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C and 6% CO₂, following the addition of G-MM™ or HSA-solution™.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from shipment date. Please check the bottle label for the expiration date.

name: G-2™
title: G-2™ v5
subtitle: Blastocyst Development Medium
description: This medium is developed to support embryos from the 8-cell stage to the blastocyst stage. It contains carbohydrates, amino acids, and conjugates to support advanced-stage embryo development.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium for culturing embryos from day 3 to blastocyst stage.
specifications.Application: Can be used after pre-equilibration with +37°C and 6% CO₂ and addition of G-MM™ or HSA-solution™.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: G-MM™
title: G-MM™
subtitle: Recombinant Human Albumin Solution
description: G-MM™ is a supplement for all embryo culture media. It is a citrated solution of recombinant human albumin. It is a defined supplement that has been cleared of viral and prion contaminations.

specifications.Intended Use: Recombinant human albumin solution (50 mg/mL) prepared for use in assisted reproductive procedures working with gametes and embryos. G-MM™ is used as a supplement to culture media in these procedures.
specifications.Application: For addition to gamete and embryo media.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: G-PGD™
title: G-PGD™
subtitle: Embryo Biopsy Medium
description: Medium developed for embryo biopsy.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium for embryo biopsy.
specifications.Description: MOPS buffered medium without calcium and magnesium.
specifications.Application: Can be used after pre-equilibration at +37°C under ambient atmosphere and addition of G-MM™ or HSA-solution™.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: ASP™
title: ASP™
subtitle: Oocyte Aspiration Medium
description: ASP™ is developed for oocyte retrieval procedures. It is a modified HTF-medium, buffered with bicarbonate and HEPES to increase pH stability in room atmosphere. It contains pharmaceutical-grade heparin to reduce coagulation of follicular fluids and pharmaceutical-grade gentamicin as an antibiotic.

specifications.Intended Use: For oocyte collection and rinsing (follicle flushing).
specifications.Description: Bicarbonate and HEPES buffered medium containing heparin and gentamicin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration with +37°C and 5% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: IVF™
title: IVF™-30
subtitle: In Vitro Fertilization and Cleavage Medium
description: IVF™-30 is developed for fertilization, embryo culture, and embryo transfer. It is formulated according to the low glucose, low phosphate principle for IVF-ET culture media. It can be used for culture in both large volumes and under oil droplets. It is a complete medium providing optimal conditions up to the 6-8 cell stage. IVF™-30 contains pharmaceutical-grade penicillin G but does not contain phenol red.

specifications.Intended Use: For in vitro fertilization, embryo culture, and transfer.
specifications.Description: Bicarbonate buffered medium containing human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration with +37°C and 5% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: ICSI™
title: ICSI™
subtitle: Sperm Capture Solution
description: ICSI™ is a viscous transfer solution developed to facilitate sperm immobilization and injection into the oocyte. Contains pharmaceutical-grade polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP). Does not contain antibiotics.

specifications.Intended Use: For sperm immobilization prior to intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI).
specifications.Description: Viscous sperm solution containing PVP and recombinant human albumin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration at +20 ± 5°C. Suitable for at least 10 procedures.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: SPERMGRAD™ 30/125
title: SPERMGRAD™ 30/125
subtitle: Sperm Preparation Medium
description: This medium is developed to support sperm washing and purification. Contains carbohydrates to support sperm function.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium for sperm separation using gradient method.
specifications.Description: Bicarbonate and HEPES buffered medium containing silane-coated colloidal silica particles.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after addition of G-MM™ or HSA-solution™ supplemented G-IVF™ or SpermRinse™.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: SPERMRINSE™
title: SPERM RINSE™-30
subtitle: Sperm Preparation Medium
description: Medium used for sperm preparation.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium for sperm preparation.
specifications.Description: Bicarbonate and HEPES buffered medium containing human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration with +37°C and 5% CO₂.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: SPERMFREEZE SOLUTION™
title: SPERM FREEZE SOLUTION™
subtitle: Sperm Cryopreservation Medium
description: This medium is developed to maximize sperm survival and preserve DNA integrity and function after the freezing process.

specifications.Intended Use: Medium used for cryopreservation of human sperm.
specifications.Description: MOPS buffered medium containing bicarbonate and human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after pre-equilibration under ambient atmosphere at +20°C ± 5°C.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: OVOIL™
title: OVOIL™
subtitle: Culture Oil
description: Developed to cover the surface of media in culture tubes, wells, or droplets. It is a light paraffin oil of appropriate viscosity and high purity.

specifications.Intended Use: For covering media in in vitro fertilization and micromanipulation procedures.
specifications.Application: Should be used after pre-equilibration with +37°C and ambient atmosphere, 5% or 6% CO₂ according to intended use.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: HYASE™-10X
title: HYASE™-10X
subtitle: Concentrated Hyaluronidase
description: HYASE™-10X is concentrated 10-fold and is used after dilution for denudation of oocytes prior to ICSI procedures. HYASE™-10X contains hyaluronidase to assist in the removal of cumulus mass and corona using a proper borosilicate glass pipette during denudation. HYASE™-10X must be diluted in G-OOCYTE™ / supplemented G-MOPS™ / GAMETE™-30 before use. Both technical experience and hyaluronidase concentration are important factors in the procedure outcome. HYASE™-10X contains pharmaceutical-grade penicillin G.

specifications.Intended Use: For removal of cumulus cells.
specifications.Description: Physiological saline buffer containing hyaluronidase and human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Can be used after 1:10 dilution. HYASE™-10X contains 800 IU/mL hyaluronidase.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

specifications.Description: Pre-assembled pipette with balloon featuring straight and smooth tip
specifications.Intended Use: Used for removal of cumulus cell layers, transfer of oocytes, embryos and blastocysts, or fertilization check
specifications.Application: Suitable for use with a pipette holder with silicone rubber balloon

specifications.Description: Pipette with straight and smooth tip
specifications.Intended Use: For transfer of oocytes, embryos and blastocysts, or checking fertilization
specifications.Application: For use with a pipette holder and silicone bulb

specifications.Description: Pipette with pointed tip, with or without spike
specifications.Intended Use: For aspiration of single sperm and intracytoplasmic injection into oocyte
specifications.Application: For use with micromanipulator

specifications.Description: Pipette with polished and rounded tip
specifications.Intended Use: For holding oocytes or embryos during ICSI or other micromanipulation procedures
specifications.Application: For use with micromanipulator

specifications.Intended Use: For creating a small slit in the zona pellucida for assisted hatching or embryo biopsy
specifications.Application: For use with micromanipulator

specifications.Description: Pipette with straight and smooth tip
specifications.Intended Use: For embryo biopsy
specifications.Application: For use with micromanipulator

name: MICRO-DROPLET DISH
title: MICRO-DROPLET DISH
subtitle: Micro-Droplet Culture Dish
description: Our culture dishes, specially designed and approved for IVF, provide a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Consists of 12 micro-wells optimized for 25-35 µL droplets. Alphanumeric identification facilitates embryo identification both under and outside the microscope.

specifications.Intended Use: Culture dish for IVF procedures
specifications.Application: Optimized for 25-35 µL droplets

name: 5-WELL DISH
title: 5-WELL DISH
subtitle: 5-Well Culture Dish
description: Our culture dishes, specially designed and approved for IVF, provide a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Consists of 5 wells.

specifications.Intended Use: Culture dish for IVF procedures

name: CENTRE-WELL DISH
title: CENTRE-WELL DISH
subtitle: Center-Well Culture Dish
description: Our culture dishes, specially designed and approved for IVF, provide a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Offers multi-purpose functionality for fertilization, cryo-procedures, embryo culture, and embryo transfer. The oval center well facilitates embryo placement and access.

specifications.Intended Use: Multi-purpose culture dish for fertilization, cryo-procedures, embryo culture, and embryo transfer

name: OCTAX LASER
title: OCTAX LASER & IMAGING SYSTEM
description: Octax is more than just a laser; it is a multi-purpose platform for digital imaging, image analysis, and advanced applications in assisted reproduction. Modular and extremely user-friendly, Octax laser and imaging systems combine advanced technology hardware and software tools with enhanced functionality to meet the needs of modern IVF clinics. Static Octax LaserShot and Dynamic Octax NaviLase provide secure operation with excellent image quality. Both lasers require no calibration and no pilot laser light. Can be used for all laser applications in IVF procedures: embryo hatching, trophectoderm, blastomere and polar body biopsy, blastocyst collapse, sperm immobilization, sperm viability testing.

products.name: Dynamic Laser - Octax NaviLase
products.title: Dynamic Laser - Octax NaviLase
products.description: With NaviLase, the embryo remains stationary while the laser is directed to the selected target area. You can make multiple shots along a straight or curved line. Curved line multiple shots, straight line multiple shots, double or triple shot cutting.

products.name: Static Laser - Octax LaserShot
products.title: Static Laser - Octax LaserShot
products.description: With Octax LaserShot, the laser target area is fixed and the embryo is aligned relative to the laser target area.

name: EMBRYOSCOPE +
title: EMBRYOSCOPE+ TIME-LAPSE SYSTEM
description: EmbryoScope+ provides a safe and continuous development environment for embryos, enabling the selection of embryos with the highest pregnancy potential. This technology allows real-time recording and visualization of embryo cell division, making it possible to monitor all developmental stages from the beginning of life.

specifications.Intended Use: To provide an environment with controlled temperature and CO₂ levels at or near body temperature for the development of eggs or embryos. EmbryoScope+ Time-lapse incubator use is limited to 120 hours from post-fertilization to day five of development.

name: EMBRYOSCOPE 8
title: EMBRYOSCOPE 8
description: EmbryoScope 8 provides a safe and continuous development environment for embryos, enabling the selection of embryos with the highest pregnancy potential.

specifications.Intended Use: To provide an environment with controlled temperature and CO₂ levels for the development of eggs or embryos. EmbryoScope 8 incubator use is limited to 120 hours from post-fertilization to day five of development.

name: EMBRYOSCOPE FLEX
title: EMBRYOSCOPE FLEX
description: EmbryoScope Flex provides a safe and continuous development environment for embryos, enabling the selection of embryos with the highest pregnancy potential.

specifications.Intended Use: To provide an environment with controlled temperature and CO₂ levels for the development of eggs or embryos. EmbryoScope Flex incubator use is limited to 120 hours from post-fertilization to day five of development.

name: EMBRYOSCOPE TIME-LAPSE SYSTEM
title: EMBRYOSCOPE TIME-LAPSE SYSTEM
description: EmbryoScope provides a safe and continuous development environment for embryos, enabling detailed embryo development monitoring for selecting embryos with the highest pregnancy potential. This technology allows real-time recording and visualization of embryo cell division, monitoring all developmental stages from the beginning of life. The recordings enable detailed retrospective analysis of development at any point. Since embryos are not removed from the device during imaging, a safe environment is provided where they won't be affected by external conditions. The triple gas incubator ensures rapid and accurate regulation of CO2 and O2 concentrations with minimal gas consumption. Small incubation chambers minimize changes in culture conditions when adding or removing patients. EmbryoScope can simultaneously capture time-lapse videos from 6 patients with 12 embryos each.

specifications.Intended Use: To provide an environment with controlled temperature and CO2 levels at or near body temperature for the development of eggs or embryos. EmbryoScope time-lapse incubator use is limited to five days (120 hours) from post-fertilization to day five of development.

name: RAPIDWARM™ CLEAVE
title: RAPID WARM™ CLEAVE
subtitle: Cleavage Stage Vitrification Warming Medium
description: This medium is designed to support vitrified cleavage stage embryos during warming and maintain their viability.

specifications.Intended Use: Warming medium for vitrified cleavage stage embryos.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after pre-equilibration at +37°C.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: RAPIDWARM™ OMNI
title: RAPIDWARM™ OMNI
subtitle: Vitrification Warming Medium

specifications.Intended Use: Warming medium for vitrified oocyte-blastocyst stage embryos.
specifications.Description: MOPS buffered medium containing cryoprotectants and human serum albumin.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after pre-equilibration at +37°C under ambient atmosphere.

specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: RAPIDWARM BLAST™
title: RAPID WARM BLAST™
subtitle: Blastocyst Vitrification Warming Medium
description: This medium is designed to support vitrified blastocyst stage embryos during warming and maintain their viability.

specifications.Intended Use: Warming medium for vitrified blastocyst stage embryos.
specifications.Application: Suitable for use after pre-equilibration at +37°C.
specifications.Shelf Life: Minimum 5 weeks from date of dispatch. Please refer to the bottle label for expiration date.

name: CULTURE DISH 40 MM
title: CULTURE DISH 40 MM
subtitle: 40 mm Culture Dish
description: Our culture dishes, specially designed and approved for IVF, provide a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Designed for embryo culture.

Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Can be used for oocyte collection, fertilization, and embryo culture.

Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. Well edges are sloped to facilitate embryo imaging. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Designed for oocyte collection.

specifications.Intended Use: Culture dish for oocyte collection

name: CENTRIFUGE TUBES
title: CENTRIFUGE TUBE
subtitle: Centrifuge Tube
description: Our centrifuge tube, specially designed and approved for IVF, provides a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. 15 mL centrifuge tube with screw cap. MEA tested.

specifications.Intended Use: Centrifuge tube for IVF procedures

name: SEROLOGICAL PIPETTES
title: SEROLOGICAL PIPETTES
subtitle: Serological Pipettes
description: Our certified and quality-tested serological pipettes provide a safe environment for gametes and embryos. Features wide application range. Available in 1 mL, 2 mL, 5 mL, and 10 mL variants.

specifications.Content: 1 mL, 2 mL, 5 mL, and 10 mL options
specifications.Intended Use: Serological pipettes for IVF procedures

name: PASTEUR PIPETTES
title: PASTEUR PIPETTES
subtitle: Pasteur Pipettes
description: Our certified and quality-tested Pasteur pipettes provide a safe environment for gametes and embryos. Available in 1 mL and 3 mL variants.

specifications.Intended Use: Pasteur pipettes for IVF procedures

name: OOCYTE COLLECTION TUBE
title: OOCYTE COLLECTION TUBE
subtitle: Oocyte Collection Tube
description: 14 mL oocyte collection tube with two-position cap for air flow. MEA tested.

specifications.Intended Use: Tube for oocyte collection

name: SINGLE LUMEN™
title: SINGLE LUMEN™
subtitle: Single Lumen Oocyte Retrieval Needle
description: Designed to optimize aspiration time, maximize control, and enhance patient comfort.

specifications.Intended Use: For aspiration of oocytes from ovarian follicles
specifications.Application: For use with appropriate aspiration pump, collection tube, and aspiration pump tubing

name: DOUBLE LUMEN™
title: DOUBLE LUMEN™
subtitle: Double Lumen Oocyte Retrieval Needle
description: Designed to optimize aspiration time, maximize control, and enhance patient comfort.

specifications.Intended Use: Designed for flushing and aspiration of oocytes from ovarian follicles
specifications.Application: For use with appropriate aspiration pump, flushing syringe, collection tube, and aspiration pump tubing

name: SENSE™
title: SENSE™
subtitle: Oocyte Retrieval Needle
description: Designed to optimize aspiration time, maximize control, and enhance patient comfort.

specifications.Intended Use: Designed for flushing and/or aspiration of oocytes from ovarian follicles

name: VACUUM PUMP TUBING
title: VACUUM PUMP TUBING
subtitle: Aspiration Pump Tubing
description: Aspiration Pump Tubing is designed for connection between the needle and aspiration pump during oocyte collection and serves as an extension.

specifications.Features: All aspiration pump tubing comes with a male luer lock connection at one end designed for needle connection.

name: ULTRASOUND TRANSMISSION GEL
title: ULTRASOUND TRANSMISSION GEL
subtitle: Ultrasound Gel
description: Vitrolife gel is the perfect combination of safety, performance, and comfort.

specifications.Packaging: In a convenient storage box for quick use

name: TRANSDUCER COVER
title: TRANSDUCER COVER
subtitle: Transducer Cover
description: Transducer covers are used for sterilization and protection of the ultrasound probe.

Features: Specially designed along their lengths to prevent accidental breakage

name: RAPID-I™ Vitrification System
title: RAPID-I™ Vitrification System
subtitle: Closed system designed for time-saving, easy, and successful vitrification
description: The Rapid-I™ Vitrification System provides a safe and effective solution for embryo vitrification. Its closed system design reduces contamination risk and enhances embryo safety.

accessories.name: SmartBox™
accessories.description: Liquid nitrogen container used with Rapid-I™

accessories.name: Rapid-I™ Sealer
accessories.description: Ultrasonic sealer used to seal Rapid-I Kits

accessories.name: Rapid-I™ Cutter
accessories.description: Scissors used to open vitrification rod

accessories.name: Rapid-I™ Forceps
accessories.description: Holding forceps used to retrieve Rapid-I rod after opening

name: ICSI DISH
title: ICSI DISH
subtitle: ICSI Culture Dish
description: Our culture dishes, specially designed and approved for IVF, provide a reliable environment for your procedures. Ready to use. Stored at room temperature. Features a dedicated area for patient identification separate from the working area. Surface areas are designed specifically for embryo culture. The base surface is in contact with the heating plate, ensuring uniform temperature distribution. Specially designed for use in ICSI procedures.

specifications.Intended Use: Special culture dish for ICSI procedures

name: eva
title: EVALUATION TOOLS
description: Traditional embryo evaluation provides limited information about embryo development. Using time-lapse analysis, you can analyze high-quality videos of embryo development and easily record the information you need about each embryo to streamline evaluation. You can detect previously unseen embryo development patterns and events associated with clinical outcomes.

products.name: EmbryoViewer Software
products.title: EmbryoViewer Software
products.description: Software used for displaying, comparing, storing, and transferring images generated by the EmbryoScope Time-lapse incubator. With EmbryoViewer software, you can examine, annotate, and compare the development of selected embryos from the collected data. Incubator operating conditions are automatically stored with patient data and can be monitored in EmbryoViewer software for quality assurance.

products.name: KIDScore™ Decision Support Tool
products.title: KIDScore™ Decision Support Tool
products.description: KIDScore™ decision support tools assign an objective score to each embryo. Scores reflect implantation potential and provide consistent and effective support for embryo assessment.

products.name: KIDScore D3
products.title: KIDScore D3
products.description: Used when day 3 embryo transfer is preferred and when choosing between embryos that have reached the expected stage on day 3. KIDScore D3 assigns a morphokinetic score of 1-5 to your embryos. The score is a relative measure of the embryo's implantation potential.

products.name: KIDScore D5
products.title: KIDScore D5
products.description: Used when more quality blastocysts are available than planned for transfer and when deciding which embryos are suitable for biopsy or diagnosis. KIDScore D5 calculates a score between 1-9.9 for each embryo, considering the embryo's morphology and morphokinetic characteristics. The score reflects statistical implantation chance based on development information during the five-day culture period.

products.name: Guided Annotation
products.title: Guided Annotation
products.description: AI-based Guided Annotation enables quick, precise, and consistent analysis of embryo development based on your information requirements before embryo selection. It guides you through likely timings of developmental events such as cleavage timing, morphology assessment, and pronuclear checking.

name: IMAGING SYSTEM CULTURE DISHES
title: IMAGING SYSTEM CULTURE DISHES
description: Culture dishes specially designed for EmbryoScope and other time-lapse systems. These dishes optimize embryo culture and imaging processes.

products.name: pH Validation Dish
products.description: Non-sterile dish with silicone lid used for equilibrating medium samples before performing pH measurements in EmbryoScope+, EmbryoScope 8, or CulturePro.

specifications.Medium Usage: 2 x 180 µL medium, 1.6 mL oil overlay

products.name: EmbryoSlide+ ic8 Dish
products.description: Used for embryo culture in EmbryoScope+ and EmbryoScope 8 devices. Each EmbryoSlide+ ic8 dish contains 8 separate culture wells.
additional_details: 8 embryos held in separate culture wells
4 washing/rinsing wells, each containing 25 µL - 30 µL medium

products.name: EmbryoSlide+® Culture Dish
products.description: Used for embryo culture in EmbryoScope+ and EmbryoScope 8 devices. Each EmbryoSlide+ culture dish contains 16 microwells for incubation of 16 embryos.

specifications.Medium Usage: 2 x 25 µL medium, 1.4 mL oil overlay

additional_details: 16 embryos held in separate culture wells in 2 reservoirs
4 washing/rinsing wells, each containing 25 µL - 30 µL medium

products.name: VACUUM PUMP TUBING
products.title: VACUUM PUMP TUBING
products.subtitle: Aspiration Pump Tubing
products.description: Aspiration Pump Tubing is designed for connection between the needle and aspiration pump during oocyte collection and serves as an extension. All aspiration pump tubing comes with a male luer lock connection at one end designed for needle connection. The opposite end can be one of the following: Male luer lock connection, Female luer lock connection, or Open end

products.name: ULTRASOUND TRANSMISSION GEL
products.title: ULTRASOUND TRANSMISSION GEL
products.subtitle: Ultrasound Transmission Gel
products.description: Vitrolife gel is the perfect combination of safety, performance, and comfort. The gel is sterile and comes in a convenient storage box containing 50 pieces of 20g each for quick use.

products.name: TRANSDUCER COVER
products.title: TRANSDUCER COVER
products.subtitle: Transducer Cover
products.description: Individually wrapped latex-free covers. Made from polyethylene and specially designed along their lengths to prevent accidental breakage.

specifications.Description: Pipette with straight and smooth tip
specifications.Intended Use: For creating a hole in the zona pellucida for assisted hatching or embryo biopsy
specifications.Application: For use with micromanipulator

specifications.Intended Use: For use with denudation and transfer pipettes

products.name: Pipette Holder
products.description: Used for securely holding and controlling pipettes

products.name: Connection Pieces
products.description: Used to make different pipette types compatible with the system
